scripts.clean: yarn clean:pods && yarn clean:js && rm -rf ios/build/ && rm -rf android/.gradle/ && rm -rf android/app/build/ && rm -rf android/build/
scripts.clean:js: rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && find . -type d -name __generated__ -prune -exec rm -rf {} \; && rm -rf node_modules/ && yarn
scripts.clean:ios: yarn clean:pods && yarn clean:js && rm -rf ios/build/
scripts.clean:android: yarn clean:js && rm -rf android/.gradle/ && rm -rf android/app/build/ && rm -rf android/build/
